00029   class AdcValueAccess
00030   {
00031   public:
00032     AdcValueAccess(const LCCollection *adc_collection, const MappingAndAlignment *alignment, const Calibration *calibration, CellParameterArray_t *cell_parameter) 
00033       : _adcCollection(adc_collection),
00034         _currentAdcBlock(_adcCollection->getElementAt(0)), //Must be initialsised with a dummy element to prevent a memory leak.
00035         _mapping(alignment),
00036         _calibration(calibration),
00037         _cellParameter(cell_parameter)
00038 
00039     
00040       //  ,_nBlocks(_adcCollection->getNumberOfElements())
00041     {
00042 
00043       //    for (UInt_t block_i=0; block_i<(UInt_t) _adcCollection->getNumberOfElements(); block_i++) {
00044       //      _currentAdcBlock=AdcBlock(_adcCollection->getElementAt(block_i));
00045       //      std::cout << "access block=" << block_i
00046       //                <<  " crate=" << _currentAdcBlock.getCrateID()
00047       //                <<  " slot=" << _currentAdcBlock.getSlotID()
00048       //                <<  " fe=" << _currentAdcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd()
00049       //                <<  " label=" << _currentAdcBlock.getBoardLabel()
00050       //                << std::endl;
00051       //      
00052       //    }
00053 
00054       setToFirstBlock();
00055     };
00056 
00057     UInt_t getNBlocks() const {
00058       return _adcCollection->getNumberOfElements()  ;
00059       //    return _nBlocks;
00060     };
00061 
00062     UInt_t getNValuesPerBlock() const {
00063       return _nValuesPerBlock;
00064     };
00065   
00066     void setToFirstBlock() 
00067 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00068       throw(std::range_error)
00069 #endif
00070     {
00071 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00072       if (getNBlocks()<=0) {
00073         throw std::range_error("AdcValueAccess::setToFirstBlock> There are no adc blocks.");
00074       }
00075 #endif
00076       _useRightSide=false;
00077       _nValuesPerBlock=0;
00078       _blockIndex=(unsigned int) -1;
00079       nextBlock();
00080     };
00081 
00082     bool hasConnectedBlocks() {
00083       return _blockIndex<getNBlocks();
00084     };
00085     
00086     bool nextBlock()
00087     {
00088       if (!_useRightSide) {
00089         do {
00090           if (++_blockIndex>=getNBlocks()) return false;
00091 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00092           std::cout << "access block=" << _blockIndex << "/" << getNBlocks() << " line=" << _lineIndex <<std::endl;
00093 #endif
00094           _currentAdcBlock=AdcBlock(_adcCollection->getElementAt(_blockIndex));
00095           _moduleIndices=_mapping->getModuleIndex(_currentAdcBlock.getCrateID(),_currentAdcBlock.getSlotID(),_currentAdcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd());
00096         } while ( (_moduleIndices.first>=UINT_MAX && _moduleIndices.second>=UINT_MAX) || _currentAdcBlock.getMultiplexPosition()>=18);
00097 
00098         if (_moduleIndices.first<UINT_MAX) {
00099           _lineIndex=_mapping->getLineIndexOfLeftSide();
00100           _cellIndex.first=_moduleIndices.first;
00101           _cellIndex.second=_mapping->getCellIndex(_cellIndex.first, _currentAdcBlock.getMultiplexPosition(),0)-_lineIndex;
00102           _useRightSide=_mapping->hasRightSide(_moduleIndices);
00103           _nValuesPerBlock=_mapping->getNumberOfLines(_moduleIndices,false);
00104           return true;
00105         }
00106       } 
00107       _lineIndex=_mapping->getLineIndexOfRightSide();
00108       _cellIndex.first=_moduleIndices.second;
00109       _cellIndex.second=_mapping->getCellIndex(_cellIndex.first, _currentAdcBlock.getMultiplexPosition(),0)-_lineIndex;
00110       _useRightSide=false;
00111       _nValuesPerBlock=_mapping->getNumberOfLines(_moduleIndices,true);
00112       return true;
00113     };
00114 
00115     //    void setToFirstValue() {
00116     //      _lineIndex=0;
00117     //    };
00118 
00119     bool nextValue() {
00120       return ++_lineIndex<_nValuesPerBlock;
00121     };
00122 
00123     int getAdcValue() const
00124 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00125       throw(std::range_error)
00126 #endif
00127     {
00128 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00129       if (_lineIndex>=_nValuesPerBlock) {
00130         throw std::range_error("AdcValueAccess::getAdcValueOfCurrentBlock> value index out of bounds");
00131       }
00132 #endif
00133       return _currentAdcBlock.getAdcVal(_lineIndex);
00134     };
00135 
00136     Float_t getCalibratedValue(Float_t pedestal) const {
00137       // ---- DEBUG:
00138       //     CellIndex index(getGeometricalCellIndex());
00139       //     std::cout << "l:" << index.getLayerIndex() << " pr:" << index.getPadRow() << " pc:" << index.getPadColumn() 
00140       //              << " wr:" << index.getWaferRow() << " wl:" << index.getWaferColumn()
00141       //              << " mod=" << _cellIndex.first << " cell=" << _cellIndex.second+_lineIndex
00142       //              << "  id=" << _mapping->getModuleID(_cellIndex.first)
00143       //              << " cal =" << _calibration->getCalibratedValue(_mapping->getModuleID(_cellIndex.first),
00144       //                                           _mapping->getModuleType(_cellIndex.first),
00145       //                                           _cellIndex.second+_lineIndex,
00146       //                                           1.)
00147       //              << std::endl;
00148       // ___DEBUG___
00149 
00150       return _calibration->getCalibratedValue(_mapping->getModuleID(_cellIndex.first),
00151                                               _mapping->getModuleType(_cellIndex.first),
00152                                               _cellIndex.second+_lineIndex,
00153                                               getAdcValue()-pedestal);
00154     };
00155 
00156     // FIXME: Change to unsigned int ?
00157     int getModuleIndex() const {
00158       return _cellIndex.first;
00159     };
00160 
00161     // FIXME: Change to unsigned int ?
00162     int getCellIndexOnModule() const {
00163       // TODO: verify that +_lineIndex is correct.
00164       return _cellIndex.second+_lineIndex;
00165     };
00166

00169     //  };
00170 
00171     // FIXME: Change to unsigned int ?
00172     int getGeometricalCellIndex() const {
00173       return _mapping->getGeometricalCellIndex(_cellIndex.first,_cellIndex.second+_lineIndex);
00174     };
00175 
00176     ThreeVector_t getPosition() const {
00177       return _mapping->getPosition(_cellIndex.first,_cellIndex.second+_lineIndex);
00178     };
00179 
00180     CellParameter &getParameter() {
00181       return ((*_cellParameter)[_cellIndex.first])[_cellIndex.second+_lineIndex];
00182     };
00183 
00184     const CellParameter &getParameter() const {
00185       return ((*_cellParameter)[_cellIndex.first])[_cellIndex.second+_lineIndex];
00186     };
00187 
00188     CALICE::BoardID getBoardID() const {
00189       return CALICE::BoardID(_currentAdcBlock.getBoardID());
00190     }
00191 
00192     UInt_t getBoardFrontEnd() const {
00193       return _currentAdcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd();
00194     }
00195 
00196     UInt_t getSlotID() const {
00197       return _currentAdcBlock.getSlotID();
00198     }
00199 
00200     bool isRightSide() const {
00201       return _lineIndex >= _mapping->getLineIndexOfRightSide();
00202     }

00206     UInt_t _nValuesPerBlock;
00207     bool _useRightSide;

00210     UInt_t _lineIndex;
00211     std::pair<UInt_t,UInt_t> _moduleIndices;
00212     std::pair<UInt_t, UInt_t> _cellIndex;
